verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* concerning all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that \add was\add* the \w first|strong="H7224"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

The which \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

From the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that \add is\add* the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath come unto me, and I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto you, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*; but ye have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto you all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them;\add* but ye have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w*, nor \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* your \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

They \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Turn ye \w again|strong="H7725"\w* now every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and from the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto you and to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

And \w go|strong="H3212"\w* not \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them, and provoke me not to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; and I will do you no \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w*.

Yet ye have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; that ye might provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to your own \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.
¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Because ye have not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,

Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, and against all these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and will utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* them, and \w make|strong="H7760"\w* them an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, and \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w desolations|strong="H2723"\w*.

Moreover I will \w take|strong="H0006"\w* from them the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w mirth|strong="H8342"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*, the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w millstones|strong="H7347"\w*, and the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w candle|strong="H5216"\w*.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft I will…: Heb. I will cause to perish from them\f*

And this whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be a \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*, \add and\add* an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*; and these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* are \w accomplished|strong="H4390"\w*, \add that\add* I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and that \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* it \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w desolations|strong="H8077"\w*.\f + \fr 25.12 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon that \w land|strong="H0776"\w* all my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against it, \add even\add* all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, which \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* hath \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* against all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

For \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* themselves of them also: and I will \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* them according to their \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w*, and according to the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of their own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto me; \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of this \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* at my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and cause all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, to whom I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee, to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* it.

And they shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and be \w moved|strong="H1607"\w*, and be \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* that I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* among them.

Then \w took|strong="H3947"\w* I the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* at the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and made all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, unto whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me:

\add To wit\add*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof, to \w make|strong="H5414"\w* them a \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*, an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*; as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*;

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

And all the \w mingled|strong="H6153"\w* people, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w*, and \w Azzah|strong="H5804"\w*, and \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, and the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*,
\w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*,

And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* which \add are\add* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*,\f + \fr 25.22 \ft isles: or, region by the sea side\f*

\w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*, and \w Tema|strong="H8485"\w*, and \w Buz|strong="H0938"\w*, and all \add that are\add* in the \w utmost|strong="H7112"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w*,\f + \fr 25.23 \ft that…: Heb. cut off into corners, or, having the corners of the hair polled\f*

And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the mingled \w people|strong="H6153"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*,

And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*,

And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w far|strong="H7350"\w* and \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, and all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w world|strong="H0776"\w*, which \add are\add* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Sheshach|strong="H8347"\w* shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them.

Therefore thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Drink|strong="H8354"\w* ye, and be \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*, and \w spue|strong="H7006"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* no more, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* which I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* among you.

And it shall be, if they \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* at thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, then shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Ye shall \w certainly|strong="H8354"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

For, lo, I \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to bring \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* on the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and should ye be \w utterly|strong="H5352"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*? Ye shall not be \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*: for I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* for a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 25.29 \ft which…: Heb. upon which my name is called\f*

Therefore \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* thou against them all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* from on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, and \w utter|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*; he shall \w mightily|strong="H7580"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* upon his \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*; he shall \w give|strong="H6030"\w* a \w shout|strong="H1959"\w*, as they that \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \add the grapes\add*, against all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

A \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add even\add* to the \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath a \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* with the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, he will \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; he will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \add that are\add* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Behold, \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* to \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* shall be raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* from the \w coasts|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \add one\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* even unto the \add other\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: they shall not be \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w*, neither \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*, nor \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*; they shall be \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*.

¶ \w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*; and \w wallow|strong="H6428"\w* yourselves \add in the ashes\add*, ye \w principal|strong="H0117"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*: for the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w slaughter|strong="H2873"\w* and of your \w dispersions|strong="H8600"\w* are \w accomplished|strong="H4390"\w*; and ye shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* like a \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 25.34 \ft the days…: Heb. your days for slaughter\f*\f + \fr 25.34 \ft a pleasant…: Heb. a vessel of desire\f*

And the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* shall have no \w way|strong="H4498"\w* to \w flee|strong="H0006"\w*, nor the \w principal|strong="H0117"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* to \w escape|strong="H6413"\w*.\f + \fr 25.35 \ft the shepherds…: Heb. flight shall perish from the shepherds, and escaping from, etc\f*

A \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* of the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and an \w howling|strong="H3215"\w* of the \w principal|strong="H0117"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \add shall be heard:\add* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w* their \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*.

And the \w peaceable|strong="H7965"\w* \w habitations|strong="H4999"\w* are cut \w down|strong="H1826"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

He hath \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* his \w covert|strong="H5520"\w*, as the \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*: for their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of the \w oppressor|strong="H3238"\w*, and \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 25.38 \ft desolate: Heb. a desolation\f*
